No matter how much I searched..."},{"lineNumber":191747,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大体、付き合ってもらう必要は――","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, you didn't need to come along—"},{"lineNumber":191748,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは医療関係の本を見つけた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You found a medical-related book."},{"lineNumber":191749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!?\""},{"lineNumber":191750,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんであんたが探したら簡単に」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Why was it so easy for you to find it?\""},{"lineNumber":191751,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、これ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, this is...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっとも知らなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I had no idea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数年前にあたしが作ったんだからそりゃそうよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, because I created it a few years ago."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学会員、参加人数もまだ数百人にも満たないしね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The society's membership and participants still haven't reached even a few hundred."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「学会を作った！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You created the society!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……この世の中にはね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...In this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知識を独占しよーって下らない奴らもいるのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are foolish people who try to monopolize knowledge."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「医療の知識を独占できれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If they can monopolize medical knowledge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今後その権威は留まることなく膨れ上がるからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their authority will grow endlessly from now on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、そういう奴らとは無関係に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, independent from such people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 活動する為の場所が求められていてね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was a need for a place to carry out activities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで作っただけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and that's why I just created it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「学会って作れるものなんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I didn't know you could create a society..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「有志が集まってあーだこーだ研究成果を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's just a place where volunteers gather and discuss research results,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 発表するだけの場だもの、そりゃ作れるわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so of course you can create one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、作ったと言っても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, even though I say I created it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど姉さんに任せたみたいなもんだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I mostly left it to sister anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへ、そんなこともあったねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, yeah, that did happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「前にチラッと話した姉さん、志津香さん、ナギと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sister, Shizuka, Nagi, whom I mentioned briefly before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に冒険したときの見返りとしてね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as a reward for adventuring together,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学会設立の手伝いを姉さんに頼んだの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I asked sister to help establish the society."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「姉さん、アホみたいに顔広いやら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sister has an absurdly wide network,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 適材適所を任せる目はあるやらで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a knack for assigning the right people to the right roles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沢山の有力な医者とのパイプ作ってくれたわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she built connections with many influential doctors."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は人を紹介しただけだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just introduced people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなは、ミックスちゃんがやるって言うから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone just followed because Mix said she would do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついてきてくれただけで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They just came along."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、学会の運営自体は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, as for the management of the society itself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう他の人に任せてるんだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've already left that to others."
"...What is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ミックスは小っこいのに立派だなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mix is so small, yet so impressive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは新しく来た町の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You came to the new town's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな図書館にミックスと共にやってきていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: large library together with Mix.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大きな図書館ねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A large library, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三階建ての巨大な図書館はこの町の自慢らしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The three-story huge library is apparently the pride of this town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本棚がズラリとかなりの長さで続いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bookshelves lined up continuously for quite a length.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、なんであんたも来てるの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, why are you here too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正直、相手出来ないわよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, I can't handle you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、いいけどね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's fine though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあ、あたしは本見てくるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go look at some books then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう言って小走りに図書館の奥へ進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying that, she hurriedly went further into the library.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスの足取りは軽やかである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix's steps were light and nimble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が見ても分かるほど、珍しく上機嫌だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was unusually in a good mood, obvious to anyone who saw her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――が、すぐに落胆の表情になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: — But soon her expression turned to disappointment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさかこれだけ大きな図書館で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can't believe that in such a large library,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 医療関係の本が一つもないなんてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there isn't a single medical-related book."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正直、医学の敗北を感じるわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, I feel like medicine has lost..."
"Sigh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「付き合わせて悪かったわね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry for making you come along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰りましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we go back?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ？　医療関係の本を探すって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh? You're looking for medical books?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無駄よ。あたしがどれだけ探したと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's useless. No matter how much I searched...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大体、付き合ってもらう必要は――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, you didn't need to come along—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは医療関係の本を見つけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You found a medical-related book.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんであんたが探したら簡単に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Why was it so easy for you to find it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、これ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, this is..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I had no idea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数年前にあたしが作ったんだからそりゃそうよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, because I created it a few years ago."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The society's membership and participants still haven't reached even a few hundred."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You created the society!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……この世の中にはね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...In this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知識を独占しよーって下らない奴らもいるのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are foolish people who try to monopolize knowledge."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「医療の知識を独占できれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If they can monopolize medical knowledge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今後その権威は留まることなく膨れ上がるからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their authority will grow endlessly from now on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、そういう奴らとは無関係に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, independent from such people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 活動する為の場所が求められていてね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was a need for a place to carry out activities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで作っただけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and that's why I just created it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「学会って作れるものなんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I didn't know you could create a society..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「有志が集まってあーだこーだ研究成果を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's just a place where volunteers gather and discuss research results,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 発表するだけの場だもの、そりゃ作れるわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so of course you can create one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、作ったと言っても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, even though I say I created it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど姉さんに任せたみたいなもんだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I mostly left it to sister anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへ、そんなこともあったねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, yeah, that did happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「前にチラッと話した姉さん、志津香さん、ナギと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sister, Shizuka, Nagi, whom I mentioned briefly before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に冒険したときの見返りとしてね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as a reward for adventuring together,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学会設立の手伝いを姉さんに頼んだの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I asked sister to help establish the society."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「姉さん、アホみたいに顔広いやら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sister has an absurdly wide network,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 適材適所を任せる目はあるやらで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a knack for assigning the right people to the right roles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沢山の有力な医者とのパイプ作ってくれたわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she built connections with many influential doctors."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は人を紹介しただけだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just introduced people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなは、ミックスちゃんがやるって言うから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone just followed because Mix said she would do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついてきてくれただけで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They just came along."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、学会の運営自体は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, as for the management of the society itself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう他の人に任せてるんだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've already left that to others."
"...What is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ミックスは小っこいのに立派だなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mix is so small, yet so impressive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは新しく来た町の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You came to the new town's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな図書館にミックスと共にやってきていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: large library together with Mix.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大きな図書館ねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A large library, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三階建ての巨大な図書館はこの町の自慢らしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The three-story huge library is apparently the pride of this town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本棚がズラリとかなりの長さで続いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bookshelves lined up continuously for quite a length.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、なんであんたも来てるの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, why are you here too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正直、相手出来ないわよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, I can't handle you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、いいけどね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's fine though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあ、あたしは本見てくるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go look at some books then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう言って小走りに図書館の奥へ進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying that, she hurriedly went further into the library.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスの足取りは軽やかである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix's steps were light and nimble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が見ても分かるほど、珍しく上機嫌だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was unusually in a good mood, obvious to anyone who saw her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――が、すぐに落胆の表情になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: — But soon her expression turned to disappointment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさかこれだけ大きな図書館で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can't believe that in such a large library,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 医療関係の本が一つもないなんてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there isn't a single medical-related book."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正直、医学の敗北を感じるわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, I feel like medicine has lost..."
"Sigh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「付き合わせて悪かったわね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry for making you come along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰りましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we go back?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ？　医療関係の本を探すって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh? You're looking for medical books?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無駄よ。あたしがどれだけ探したと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's useless. No matter how much I searched...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大体、付き合ってもらう必要は――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, you didn't need to come along—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは医療関係の本を見つけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You found a medical-related book.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんであんたが探したら簡単に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Why was it so easy for you to find it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、これ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, this is..."
